LOGIN.TITLE: Welcome to MOSS! Please log in.

cancel_meeting_text: Do you really want to cancel the meeting? You will NOT be able to change any details anymore or revert the cancellation.
danger_zone_warning: This button will completely delete your account and everything related to it. There is no going back.
set_meeting_text: Do you really want to set the meeting? You will NOT be able to change any details anymore and all of your attendees' calendars will be filled with the selected timeslots.
delete_calendar_text:
Deleting a calendar will lead to you having to re-allow MOSS usage of your calendar if you desire so.
This will delete any traces of your connected calendar.
